Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

Post.title: Git
Post._content:
![](http://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/332029-53b2e99ec9b33e76.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240)


 Source-tree  Git  Git  Source-tree  Git 


## Git alias

 alias  git 

 git  `~/.gitconfig`  alias  alias:

```js
[alias]
    st = status -s
    ci = commit
    l  = log --oneline --decorate -12 --color
    ll = log --oneline --decorate --color
    lc = log --graph --color
    co = checkout
    br = branch
    ba = branch -a
    rb = rebase
    dci = dcommit
    lg = log --color --graph --pretty=format:'%Cred%h%Creset -%C(yellow)%d%Creset %s %Cgreen(%cr) %C(bold blue)<%an>%Creset' --abbrev-commit
```

> `~/.gitconfig`  user  git 

## branch 

### 

```js

# 
// git br
$ git branch

# 
// git ba
$ git branch -a
```

### 

```js
# 
// git br [xxx]
$ git branch [branch-name]
//  

# 
//   develop   feature/xxx 
$ git checkout -b newBrach origin/master

# commit
$ git branch [branch] [commit]

# 
// git co -b [local or remote/branch-name]
$ git checkout -b [branch-name]

# tag
$ git checkout -b [branch] [tag]
```

### 

```js
# 
// git co [branch-name]
$ git checkout [branch-name]

# 
$ git checkout -
```

### 

```js
# 
// git br -d [branch-name]]
$ git branch -d [branch-name]
$ git branch -D //

# 
// git br -dr [remote/branch]
// eg:  git br -dr origin/xxx_name
$ git branch -dr [remote/branch]
```

### 

```js
# 
$ git merge [branch]

# commit
$ git cherry-pick [commit]
```


## tag 

 Git  tag  commit 

###  tag

```js
$ git tag
```

###  tag

```js
$ git tag v1.4.0

//  commit log  tag
$ git tag -a v1.4 -m 'my version 1.4'

//  commit  tag
$ git tag -a v1.2 9fceb02

//  tag 
$ git show v1.4
```

###  tag

```js
// git push  tag push  origin

# push  tag name
$ git push origin v1.0
# push  tag
$ git push origin --tags
```

###  tag

```js
//  tag
$ git tag -d v0.9

//  tag
$ git push origin :refs/tags/0.1.0
## 
$ git push --delete origin v1.1
```

## git pull

git pull

### Merge   pull

>  checkout  commit git pull  Merge log
>   commit fetchpull

![](http://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/332029-6510e80758bdf307.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240)

```git

//  A  B  ( Merge log)
$ git pull origin [remote_name]:[local_name]
//   pull
$ git pull origin [remote_name]


// git fetchgit merge
$ git fetch origin
$ git merge origin/next

# Gittracking master""origin/master

// git pull
$ git pull origin

// 
$ git pull
// 

```

### rebase  pull

```js

// rebase--rebase
$ git pull --rebase <> <>:<>
// git pull --rebase origin [origin_name]:[local_name]

//  rebase   
$ git pull --rebase origin [origin_name]
//  rebase  track [origin_name] 
$ git pull --rebase origin

```


## Git push


```js
//  loca_name  push  new_name
$ git push <> <>:<>
// git push origin loca_name:new_name

# 
# 
//   push 
$ git push

// push 
$ git push origin --delete master

# Gitgit pull--force
$ git push --force origin

# git pushtag--tags
$ git push origin --tags

```


## 

###  commit

```js
//  add  commit  rebase  commit
$ git commit --amend

//  commit  commit rebase 
//   push -f 
```

### checkout  commit



```js
$ git checkout [commit id]

// check  commit
$ git checkout HEAD~2
```

### git Revert

Revert

```js
# commitcommit
# 
$ git revert [commit]
```

### git reset

-  commit

```
$ git reset HEAD

$ git reset HEAD~2
```

- 

```js
// 
//  add 
git reset <file>

// 
$ git reset

//  commit  commit    add 
$ git reset [commit_id]
```

###  reset

```js
// 
$ git reset --hard

//  commit 
$ git reset --hard <commit>

# HEADcommit
$ git reset --keep [commit]
```
